message: Delivery Works. There it is.
I step through the automatic doors.

name: ヨシエ
message: "Welcome. Oh, Aoba dear. I'm happy to see you again."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You too."
I bowed to Miss Yoshie and set the paper bag on the counter.
A small dog with long, shiny fur sits proudly on the counter, watching me intently.
That's Clara, Miss Yoshie's Allmate.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'd like to send this."

name: ヨシエ
message: "Certainly. Let me take that for you."
Miss Yoshie checks the address with practiced hands, then pushes a nearby button.
A box next to the counter opens. She tosses the bag inside.
This outfit specializes in delivering packages within the Old Residential District―a welcome service in a town where transportation isn't readily available.
...In any case, my work here is done.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Thanks. See you later."

name: ヨシエ
message: "Are you heading back to the store?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "No, I'm heading home. Mr. Haga said he'd be closing up early today."

name: ヨシエ
message: "Oh! Well, isn't that lovely? The final episode of AWtR is tonight! You can watch it live!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "AW...? What?"

name: ヨシエ
message: "Oh come on! Didn't I tell you about it the other day?!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Oh, right... Um... What was it again?"

name: ヨシエ
message: "It's a soap! A soap opera! A Waltz to Remember! Today she's finally going to decide on her partner!"

name: ヨシエ
message: "I'm totally rooting for Kaiser Matsuoka! That easy smile is just to die for! Not to mention his slight sadistic streak!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Uh-huh..."
Ms. Yoshie twirls her hair around her finger with a dreamy, girlish look in her eyes.
I mean... she's not a bad person or anything...

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'd better be―"

name: ヨシエ
message: "By the way, dear, have you heard? You know what I'm talking about, don't you? Or maybe you don't?"
Ms. Yoshie beckons me closer, a serious look on her face.
She's really not a bad person...
Swallowing a resigned sigh, I lean closer.
There are no other people in the shop, but for some reason, she speaks in a whisper.

name: ヨシエ
message: "You know Hyougadani in the north? The bad part of town."

name: ヨシエ
message: "You never hear anything good about that place, but lately, the rumors have been particularly nasty."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah?"

name: ヨシエ
message: "Apparently, there's a gang there led by a man who escaped from death row!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Oh. Scratch, right? I heard he's put together some really bad guys."

name: ヨシエ
message: "Yeah, that's him! They say the gang is entirely escaped criminals."

name: ヨシエ
message: "Actually, weren't some people kidnapped in that area a little while back?"

name: ヨシエ
message: "That's so scary! You can't even go out alone at night."

name: ヨシエ
message: "We can't depend on the police at all. I mean, they can be just as bad! What an awful world we live in."
She's not wrong about that. The Old Residential District police are no better than gangsters themselves.
Rub an officer the wrong way, and you could get beaten or even arrested.

name: ヨシエ
message: "Oh no! Should I hurry home before it gets too late? I mean, what will I do if someone tries to have their way with me?!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "What?"
Ms. Yoshie shoots me a meaningful look.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...I think you'll be fine."

name: ヨシエ
message: "Fine? Fine?! How can you say that?!"

name: ヨシエ
message: "I'm obviously in danger!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Well, um, I've gotta be going. Thanks."

name: クララ
message: "Hold it."
Another voice stops me before I can leave.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh?"

name: クララ
message: "How's that blue fellow doing?"

name: ヨシエ
message: "Oh, Clara, do you miss Ren? That's right, you two are the best of friends!"
Taking Clara into her arms, Ms. Yoshie shoots me an expectant look.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Oh, sorry. I left him at home today..."

name: クララ
message: "He's in that bag of yours, isn't he? Were you going to leave without having him say hello?"
No way out. I'm sorry, Ren... You'll just have to grin and bear it.
I take Ren out of my bag and gently pat his head to wake him up.

name: 蓮
message: "...Yes, Aoba?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ren, um... say hi to Clara."
Ren's ears and tail drop.
Clara stares down at him from her place in Ms. Yoshie's arms.

name: クララ
message: "What's wrong? Still sleeping?"

name: 蓮
message: "...How do you do, Clara?"

name: クララ
message: "I'm quite well, Ren."
Clara wags her tail happily. Ms. Yoshie smiles too.

name: ヨシエ
message: "You two are just adorable together!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "A-Ahaha..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Now that you've said hello, I'd really better be―"

name: ヨシエ
message: "Oh, wait! Wait, dear!"

name: ヨシエ
message: "I'm sorry, I know you were on your way out! I just need one more thing! I promise it'll be quick!"
